skills.name: SYNTHESIS
desc: • Deals 3 hits of true damage to all enemies.
• 15% Chance to Remove A Beneficial Effect per hit.
• Stun the target if a beneficial effect is removed.

skills.name: SUPPRESSION
desc: • Deals true damage to all enemies.
• 50% Chance to inflict Perfect Corruption, Permadeath, and Heal Block for 2 turns.

skills.name: OBSTRUCT
desc: Grants Immunity to Mark, Doom, and Curse effects for all allies.
